summary.span: 将在项目中生成的目标。

span.span: Targets that we will build in the project.

summary.span: 不同的项目类型可能有不同的含义，将在此处添加重新生成、清理等任务。

span.span: This may mean different things for different project types, our tasks will put something like Rebuild, Clean, etc. here.

summary.span: 如果使用默认目标生成项目，则此值可能为 null。

span.span: This may be null if the project is being built with the default target.

value.span: 正在外部项目中生成的目标的名称。

span.span: The names of the targets being built in the external project.

value.span: 如果使用默认目标生成外部项目，则此值可以为 null 引用 ( 在 Visual Basic) 中。

span.span: This can be a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the external project is being built with the default target.
